.
Impact of PL 112-154, Section 506, on FDC Effective Dates
In certain situations, retroactive effective dates were warranted under
Public Law (PL) 112-154
, Section 506, for certain fully developed claims (FDCs), as is discussed in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 2.B.4
, and
the attachment,
Historical_M21-1III_i_3_SecB_2-19-19.docx
.
Otherwise, a claimâ€™s inclusion in the FDC Program does not uniquely impact effective date assignment, and the usual effective date rules relevant to the underlying claim type and/or individual adjudicated issue(s) are for application.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Effective Dates
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
